data.title: Ruben Studdard Archives
data.text:
Singer and “American Idol” winner Ruben Studdard is reportedly on health watch. Nicknamed the “Velvet Teddy Bear” because of his husky frame, Studdard has tipped the scale at nearly 400 pounds in recent months. Now, experts say if he doesn’t put himself on a diet, at 33-years-old, Studdard may not live to see the next […]

Singer and “American Idol” winner Ruben Studdard is officially single after filing for divorce in November 2011. Studdard also gets to take all his music royalties with him, due to a prenuptial agreement. He and his now former wife, Surata Zuri McCants, separated due to irreconcilable differences. During their heated divorce, reports TMZ, McCants tried […]

“American Idol” alum Ruben Studdard is back with a new album – his fifth, and opened up about his divorce, weight gain, a recent tax debacle and even about Clay Aiken’s run on “The Celebrity Apprentice” in an interview to promote the record on “The Wendy Williams Show.” Studdard, 33, won the second season of […]

Looks like those money problems of R&B singer Ruben Studdard’s may have had an effect on his marriage. Because he and wife of 3 years, Surata McCants, have called it quits. Studdard has filed for divorce from his wife. Ruben and Surata Zuri McCants married in 2008 An American Idol champion, Ruben Studdard reportedly cited […]

Fans have been waiting to hear “the real Ruben” for quite a while. BET.com reports, Ruben Studdard is ready to shed his American Idol persona and re-introduce himself to the world. The Grammy nominated artist recently signed with a new label, Shanachie Entertainment, for the release of his next album this fall. Ruben says, the […]
